Content:
Character has activated the Air Rune within their Runeblade.
Enemies hit have a 10% chance to become Shocked for 1 turn.
Wet increases this chance to 50%.

Water Rune + Earth Rune
Enemies hit have a 40% chance to be encased in Snow, lowering AP Recovery/Start by [1], Movement Speed by [2]%, and dealing Water Damage with a chance to fall down when moving.
Adds Water Damage and Earth Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Blood Rune + Air Rune
Melee attacks restore Vitality to allies within [1]m.
Adds Piercing Damage and Air Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Character has absorbed <font color='#8B0000'>Blood</font> after activating the <font color='#b823cb'>Chaos Rune</font> within their <font color='#40E0D0'>Runeblade</font>. 20% chance to apply <font color='#FF0000'>Bleeding</font> to enemies hit for 1 turn (Resisted by Magic Armor).

Blood Rune + Earth Rune
Deals additional damage when attacking Undead, with a 10% chance to Entangle enemies hit for 1 turn.
Entangle's chance is increased to 50% when attacking the Undead.
Adds Piercing Damage and Earth Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Blood Rune + Fire Rune
Enemies attacked with a Runeblade are inflicted with Soul Burn, taking damage on apply and turn, and lowering Elemental Resistance by 5% per stack (5 max).
Adds Piercing Damage and Fire Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Blood Rune x 2
Every third basic attack grants a Congealed Blood Ball, which can be thrown to create a blood surface.

Blood Rune + Poison Rune
40% chance to apply Infectious Disease on enemies hit for 1 turn.
Adds Piercing Damage and Poison Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Blood Rune + Water Rune
Regenerates Vitality on application and turn.
Adds Piercing Damage and Water Damage to weapon attacks and skills.
Character has activated the <font color='#b823cb'>Chaos Rune</font> within their <font color='#40E0D0'>Runeblade</font>, and is absorbing an element in the environment.

Water Rune + Air Rune
Applies Shocked to Wet enemies for 1 turn, otherwise Wet is applied for 1 turn.
Attacking a Shocked or Stunned enemy sends out a jolt of electricity to other enemies within 8m.
When Shocked is applied, that enemy gets Shock Resistance, preventing Shocked from being applied by Runeblades for 3 turns.
Adds Water Damage and Air Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Water Rune + Poison Rune
If an attacked target is Poisoned, the poison spreads to nearby enemies within [1]m.
If the enemies the poison spreads to are already Poisoned, the contamination continues.
Adds Water Damage and Poison Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Character has activated the Death Rune from absorbing Deathfog.
Enemies hit with a Runeblade are marked with Death Sentence for 1 turn, and cannot be marked again for 4 turns.
When an enemy with Death Sentence dies, they return as a friendly Revenant for 2 turns.
Revenants do 50% less damage, and cannot be created from bosses.

Earth Rune + Air Rune
30% chance on hit to shoot out a cone of dust in a 7m range, applying Blinded to enemies for 1 turn and dealing minor Earth Damage.
Dust Blast can only occur once per turn.
Adds Earth Damage and Air Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Character has activated the Earth Rune within their Runeblade.
Enemies hit have a 20% chance to be Slowed for 1 turn.

Fire Rune + Poison Rune
40% chance to cause a Mini-Explosion on attack, dealing Fire Damage in a 2m range.
Adds Fire Damage and Poison Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Character has activated the Fire Rune within their Runeblade.
Applies Burning to enemies hit for 1 turn.

Poison Rune + Air Rune
On attack, 50% chance to spawn or expand a Gas Cloud on the target (once per turn).
Adds Poison Damage and Air Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Fire Rune + Air Rune
If an attacked target is Burning, a heatburst burns enemies within [1]m.
If a heatburst target is already Burning, the heatburst continues.
Adds Fire Damage and Air Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Water Rune x 2
Applies Chilled to enemies hit for 1 turn. Enemies already Chilled have a 20% chance to become Frozen.

Fire Rune x 2
Applies Burning to enemies hit for 1 turns, or extends the duration of Burning by 1 turn per attack (4 turns max).

Fire Rune + Earth Rune
Enemies hit have a 60% chance to be bombarded with Lava, dealing Fire Damage, forking up to [1] times, and creating fire surfaces.
Adds Fire Damage and Earth Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Character has activated the Poison Rune within their Runeblade.
Applies Poisoned to enemies hit for 1 turn.

Earth Rune x 2
Enemies hit have a 20% chance to be [Key:LLWEAPONEX_MAGIC_KNOCKDOWN_CHECK_DisplayName] for 1 turn.
[Key:LLWEAPONEX_MAGIC_KNOCKDOWN_CHECK_DisplayName] is a magic-based knockdown.

Water Rune + Fire Rune
Enemies hit have a 40% chance to get a Water Burn for 2 turns, dealing Water + Fire Damage per turn.
Wet enemies have their moisture Evaporated, dealing damage and removing Wet.
Adds Water Damage and Fire Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Earth Rune + Poison Rune
Enemies hit have a 40% chance to be encased in Tar makes Burning bypass armor checks.
Adds Earth Damage and Poison Damage to weapon attacks and skills.

Air Rune x 2
Enemies hit have a 20% chance to be struck by a Thunderbolt, dealing Air Damage and chaining Lightning to enemies within 8m.
Wet increases this chance to 80%.Enemies can only be struck once per turn.

Poison Rune x 2
Applies Poisoned to enemies hit for 1 turn, or increases the duration of Poisoned by 1 turn per attack (4 turns max).

Character has activated the Water Rune within their Runeblade.
Applies Wet to enemies hit for 1 turn.
Character is encased in snow and takes [1] when moving, with a chance to fall down.
Character is spreading <font color='#00aa00'>Poisoned</font> to nearby allies!
The <font color='#F7BE81'>Dust Rune</font> is cooling down, and is unable to trigger another <font color='#8A4B08'>Dust Blast</font>.
The <font color='#81ab00'>Gas Rune</font> is cooling down, and is unable to trigger another <font color='#65c900'>Gas Creation</font> or <font color='#f7ba14'>Gas Expansion</font>.
Character is <font color='#fe6e27'>Burning</font> from a hot wind!
Character is spreading <font color='#fe6e27'>Burning</font> to nearby allies!
Character's <font color='#2DF9FF'>Runeblade Mastery</font> level allows them to control poison with finer precision.
The <font color='#7d71d9'>Thunderbolt Rune</font> is unable to trigger another <font color='#7d71d9'>Thunderbolt Strike</font> on this character.
Character is immune to being directly Shocked by a <font color='#40E0D0'>Runeblade</font>.
